column1: Kata Robata////Bone marrow - please don't order bone marrow and pork belly in one meal like we did. It was a horrible idea. Too much fat and cholesterol for dinner. I suspected the pork belly might have also ruined my bone marrow experience. Since my tongue just tasted something that has lots of flavors
column2: the bone marrow that came after felt plain and pretty much tasteless. Like we were just eating fat on a piece of bread.
